# Agility, Improved [synergy] (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
As *[[Agility (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|agility]]*, except the armor grants a +3 resistance bonus on Reflex saving throws.

Strong; (DC 19) transmutation; CL 9th; Synergy Prequisite: [[Agility (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|Agility]]; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|catâ€™s grace]], [[Resistance (Spell)|resistance]]*; Price +4,000 gp

**Source:** Magic Item Compendium (WotC), pg. 6
